data.trans_hint: Cô ấy chen hàng và đứng ngay trước mặt tôi ở quầy thu ngân siêu thị.
data.en_hint: She just pushed in the queue in front of me at the supermarket checkout.
data.content_game_1: She just pushed in the queue in front of me at the supermarket checkout.
data.answer_en_hint: She just pushed in the queue in front of me at the supermarket checkout.

data.trans_hint: Một vài tên tù nhân đang cố gắng để chạy trốn.
data.en_hint: Some prisoners are trying to run away.
data.content_game_1: Some prisoners are trying to run away.
data.answer_en_hint: Some prisoners are trying to run away.

data.trans: Giữ khoảng cách (lùi về phía sau)
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi lùi lại khi Jack châm pháo hoa.
data.en_hint: We stood back while Jack lit the firework.
data.content_game_1: We stood back while Jack lit the firework.
data.answer_en_hint: We stood back while Jack lit the firework.

data.trans_hint: Tại nhà hàng này, chúng tôi được phục vụ rất nhanh.
data.en_hint: In this restaurants, we get served quick as a flash

data.answer_en_hint: In this restaurants, we get served quick as a flash

data.trans_hint: Jack kịch liệt phản đối lời khuyên của mẹ anh ấy về sự nghiệp của anh ta.
data.en_hint: Jack took exception to his mom's advice on his career
data.content_game_1: Jack took exception to his mom's advice on his career
data.answer_en_hint: Jack took exception to his mom's advice on his career

data.trans: Điều tiếp theo mà tôi thấy
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã vấp phải một tảng đá khi đi bộ trên đường. Điều tiếp theo mà tôi thấy là tôi đang nằm trên giường bệnh với mẹ tôi bên cạnh.
data.en_hint: I tripped over a rock while walking on the street. The next thing I knew, I was lying in a hospital bed with my mom next to me.
data.content_game_1: I tripped over a rock while walking on the street. The next thing I knew, I was lying in a hospital bed with my mom next to me.
data.answer_en_hint: I tripped over a rock while walking on the street. The next thing I knew, I was lying in a hospital bed with my mom next to me.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã rất tức giận với nhận xét của Jack về ngoại hình tôi đến nỗi mà tôi phải đấm anh ta một phát.
data.en_hint: I was so mad at Jack's comment on my look that I threw a punch at him.
data.content_game_1: I was so mad at Jack's comment on my look that I threw a punch at him.
data.answer_en_hint: I was so mad at Jack's comment on my look that I threw a punch at him.

data.trans_hint: Đột nhiên, một gã nào đó rút súng và chĩa vào đám đông.
data.en_hint: Suddenly a guy pulled out a gun and turned it on the crowd.
data.content_game_1: Suddenly a guy pulled out a gun and turned it on the crowd.
data.answer_en_hint: Suddenly a guy pulled out a gun and turned it on the crowd.
